name: Dope Culture Sample Pack Vol.1
description:
Digital Masters Presents: Dope Culture Sample Pack Vol. 1

These sounds are perfect for creating all kinds of electronic dance music. Use them to make Trap, Dubstep, Grime, D&B, House and any other style of  electronic music. 
This pack will contain over 250 hard hitting one shot drum hits and FX that will give your production that professional sound you are looking for, and all for Â£2.99!

This pack contains:
- 52 Kicks
- 98 Snare + Claps
- 40 Cymbal One Shots
- 43 FX
- 15 Synths Loops 
- 20 Drum Loops

Release Date: 13 February 2013


Pre-order before 13th Feb and receive an extra 10 exclusive Synth Loops for free!


All samples are royalty free in .wav format and are suitable for use in any software.
